rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light, placed in the south-east direction following Vastu principles for wealth and prosperity.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances. Positioned in the north-west zone to ensure positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Comfortable dining space adjacent to living room, ensuring connectivity and communal spirit.
Dedicated home office in a quiet corner, positioned towards the north-east direction for mental clarity and productivity as per Vastu.
Multi-purpose storage area integrated within the floor plan to support both residential and joint family needs.

openings.description: Main entrance designed to welcome positive energy. Placed in the north-west to maintain good flow.
Large windows in living room ensuring ample natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu guidelines.
Kitchen windows to enhance airflow and natural light, maintaining the balance of energy.
Internal doors to connect rooms smoothly and facilitate privacy as needed.
